function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Difficulty in meeting basic living needs due to lockdown policies","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Disruption of work and production due to pandemic and lockdown policies","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of 5g video and ar glasses for remote medical care may lead to overreliance on technology and reduced in-person interaction, impacting patient care and doctor-patient relationships.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Deployment of 5g-based intelligent service robots may result in reduced human interaction, potentially impacting social connections and mental health of patients and visitors.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of 5g-based thermal imaging for human body temperature measurement may result in privacy concerns and data security risks.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Misappropriation of medical materials due to lack of supervision and monitoring","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of 5g-based driverless vehicles and unmanned distribution robots for delivery may lead to increased potential for disease transmission.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"High engagement with 5g applications may lead to increased social interaction and close contact, potentially increasing disease transmission.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Reliance on 5g-based telemedicine for medical services may lead to increased dependency and potential strain on the telemedicine infrastructure.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Reliance on 5g-based systems for remote work and education may contribute to increased dependence on technology for human interaction.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Deployment of 5g-based robots and unmanned vehicles for medical care and delivery may reduce the need for human presence, potentially impacting human labor and employment in these sectors.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g-based technologies may lead to increased reliance on efficient but vulnerable digital infrastructure, posing a risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"High-definition, no delay video consultation in the hospital may lead to over-reliance on remote healthcare and delay in seeking in-person medical attention for critical conditions.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Interactive live broadcast of tourist attractions may contribute to a false sense of security and encourage travel, potentially leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote meetings and online education may lead to reduced social interaction and physical activity, impacting mental health and overall well-being.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases through contact-based tasks.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Reliance on remote operations for on-site tasks.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources in severe epidemic areas","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Delay in transmission synchronization","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate supervision of charitable materials","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Massive and diverse 5g-based robot systems in hospitals","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"High network capacity for concurrent communication and data transmission","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources in severely affected areas","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Close contact as a key channel of infection","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Large-scale population movement causing infection","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to remote interaction and reduced spatial barriers.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Risk of misdiagnosis or delayed treatment in telemedicine due to potential information loss or distortion.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Potential for reduced focus on disease prevention and social distancing due to lifelike remote experiences.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Transmission of unstructured data from terminal sensors to the cloud platform in real-time","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Transmitting on-site high-definition images and videos to remote command center in real-time","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Transmission of high-definition images and videos and huge volume data","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Close contact of persons in the built environment","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Infectious routines of the covid-19 virus are respiratory and close contact, increasing the risk of transmission in spatialized environments.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Delay of transmission and information loss in de-spatialized environments, impacting the experience of tele-operation.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Potential risk of exposure to infectious diseases in tele-surgery due to the involvement of remote doctors.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Theoretical model of how 5g enables covid-19 prevention and control","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of novel and creative applications of digital technologies in pandemic control","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Grounded from 212 cases which applied 5g to combat against the covid-19 pandemic","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Lack of theoretical insights on the role of 5g in pandemic prevention and control","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Impact of distributed work on distance decay","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Concepts like \"death of distance\" and \"friction of distance\" minimizing the impact of geographical distance","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Interacting with people from faraway towns through the internet may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Promoting distance learning and telecommuting through synchronous communication and video conferences may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases if preventive measures are not implemented.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of disease transmission risks in virtual interactions may result in the continuation of contagious disease spread despite advancements in remote technologies.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"The use of de-spatialization and spatialization in pandemic control may lead to a misunderstanding of the objectives and strategies in disease prevention.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Automation and use of driverless vehicles and robots may lead to a reduction in the availability of human resources for pandemic prevention and control.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Limited adoption and application of 5g technology due to challenges in network structure and lack of application scenarios.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate attention to 5g’s social and business values due to focus on technological aspects and lack of commercial usage.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Reliance on telemedicine for diagnosis and treatment","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Mental health impact during lockdown","category":"","confidence":""}]}
